identity.name: Village Friends
identity.target_audience: Homeschool parents seeking connection and socialization for their children

headings.style: Soft Serif for a storybook/village feel

body.style: Rounded or Humanist Sans for friendliness and legibility

primary.name: Village Teal
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand elements

buttons.primary: bg-[#2A9D8F] hover:bg-[#21867a] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-[#F4F1DE] text-[#264653] border-2 border-[#264653] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold hover:bg-[#E9C46A] transition-all

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-[#E0E0E0] shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-6

inputs.style: bg-white border-[#E0E0E0] rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#2A9D8F] focus:border-transparent h-12 px-4

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle paper grain or noise overlay on backgrounds to enhance the 'earthy' feel
visual_enhancers.shapes: Organic blobs and waves to separate sections, avoiding harsh straight lines
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Heroicons (Outline) - Soft and rounded

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.stagger_children: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Fraunces' font for all headings to establish the village/storybook brand identity.
Implement the 'Village Teal' (#2A9D8F) as the primary action color, but use 'Coral Bloom' (#E76F51) sparingly for high-priority alerts or CTAs.
Ensure all containers have generous padding (p-6 minimum) to maintain the 'breathing room' philosophy.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
For the dashboard, use the 'Control Room' grid but soften it with rounded corners and the neutral background color (#F4F1DE).
Ensure all interactive elements have a 'data-testid' attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts; use asymmetry and the 'Tetris' grid for marketing pages.
Avoid pure black (#000000); use the deep 'Forest Canopy' (#264653) for text and dark backgrounds.
Ensure high contrast for accessibility, especially with the muted color palette.
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and cards (hover lift, shadow expansion).
